results.name: Expansion of 1/(1 - Sum_{k>=2} x^(k^2)).
comment: Number of compositions (ordered partitions) of n into squares > 1.

mathematica: nmax = 75; CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - Sum[x^k^2, {k, 2, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]
